Footer.logoDescription: University project with the purpose of creating a music web platform where users can create, share and consult music sheets.

Home.title: Welcome to the platform for musicians and artist
Home.subtitle: Compose, rearrange, share! All the resources you need to unleash your creative streak with just one click!
Home.wwd_description: Everything you need to compose and share new songs
Home.wwd_firstcard_description: Discover the passion for music like never before
Home.wwd_secondcard_title: Work in the world of music
Home.wwd_secondcard_description: Explore all our scores verified by us to ensure their originality
Home.wwd_thirdcard_title: Compose your own melodies on the web
Home.wwd_thirdcard_description: Thanks to our editor you can dive into the music sheet
Home.wwd_fourthcard_description: Take a cue from the scores published by our community or share your best creations
Home.freesection_description: We believe that music is universal and that everyone can compose their own melodies
Home.mostpopular_title: Discover our most popular music sheets
Home.mostpopular_description: Create your own variations of the songs written by you in our editor. Share and collaborate with thousands of other artists from all backgrounds united only by music.
Home.msByGenre_title: Discover our music sheets by genre
Home.msByGenre_description: Explore songs and music sheets with your own filters. Genres, popularity and many more filter only for you.
Home.peoplesection_title: Let's Jam is a game changer for composers of all skill levels
Home.peoplesection_description: The perfect place to grow as composers and musicians. Let's Jam offers you all the tools to rekindle your passion for music
Home.peoplesection_first_description: Sfrutta il nostro database di spartiti per dare sfogo alla tua passione per la musica. Lasciati ispirare dalla nostra community
Home.peoplesection_second_title: Metti il turbo alle tue composizioni
Home.peoplesection_second_description: Crea, condividi e interagisci con altri compositori appassionati proprio come te
Home.peoplesection_third_title: Tutti gli strumenti per operare nel settore
Home.peoplesection_third_description: Su Let's Jam puoi trovare tutti gli spartiti originali verificati da noi
Home.lastsection_description: Cosa aspetti iscriviti subito ed esplora la collezione di spartiti su Let's Jam

Song.heading: Tutti i nostri brani
Song.musicSheets: Esplora gli spartiti per il brano
Song.description: Prendi ispirazione, suona, scarica o riarrangia gli spartiti inseriti dalla nostra community

CreteUpload.title: Crea nuovo spartito
CreteUpload.selectInstruments: Scegli gli strumenti con cui iniziare
